comment: I am interested in seeing which big accounts that have been banned from Twitter are now here on , I would like to know how large their followings on Twitter had been at their largest before they wound up on Gab. Please respond with such information, and tag that Gab username of the account being referenced.
amr:
# ::snt I am interested in seeing which big accounts that have been banned from Twitter are now here on , I would like to know how large their followings on Twitter had been at their largest before they wound up on Gab. Please respond with such information, and tag that Gab username of the account being referenced.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / interest-01
            :ARG1 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG2 (s / see-01
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (a / account
                        :mod (b / big)
                        :ARG1-of (b2 / ban-01
                              :ARG2 (p / publication
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Twitter"))
                              :time (n2 / now)))))
      :snt2 (l / like-02
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (k / know-01
                  :ARG0 ii3
                  :ARG1 (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG1 (f / follow-02
                              :ARG0 a
                              :medium p)
                        :ARG2 (l2 / large)
                        :ARG3 (m2 / most)
                        :ARG5 (f2 / follow-02
                              :ARG0 (a2 / account
                                    :mod (b3 / big))
                              :time (b4 / before
                                    :op1 (w / wound-up-02
                                          :ARG1 f
                                          :ARG2 (p2 / publication
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "Gab"))))))))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :polite +
            :op1 (r / respond-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (ii4 / information
                        :mod (s2 / such)))
            :op2 (t / tag-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (u / username
                        :mod (p3 / product
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Gab"))
                        :poss a2
                        :ARG1-of (r2 / reference-04)))))
